languages.text: "Слабых — заставь склониться. Сильных — усмири или же дождись момента, чтобы нанести удар в спину. Сам{mf||а} или с помощью верных союзников".
"Make the weak kneel before you. Subdue the strong or wait for the moment to strike them in the back. Do it alone or with your faithful allies."
languages.original_text: "Слабых — заставь склониться. Сильных — усмири или же дождись момента, чтобы нанести удар в спину. Сам{mf||а} или с помощью верных союзников".

traits.locale_text: "The weak shall be put on their knees before you. The strong shall be tamed or stabbed in the back at a right moment. Do it alone or with your faithful allies' help."
"The weak shall be put on their knees before you. The strong shall be tamed or stabbed in the back at a right moment. Do it alone or with your faithful allies' help."
"Make the weak kneel before you. Subdue the strong or wait for the moment to stab them in the back. Do it alone or with your faithful allies."
"Make the weak kneel before you. Subdue the strong or wait for the moment to stab them in the back. Do it alone or with your faithful allies."
"Make the weak kneel before you. Subdue the strong or wait for the moment to strike them in the back. Do it alone or with your faithful allies."

languages.text: “让那些弱者跪在你面前。征服那些强者，或伺机从背后捅他们一刀。要么一个人实现这个目标，要么与你忠实的盟友一起行动。”
languages.original_text: "Make the weak kneel before you. Subdue the strong or wait for the moment to strike them in the back. Do it alone or with your faithful allies."

traits.locale_text: “让那些弱者跪在你面前。征服那些强者，或伺机从背后捅他们一刀。要么一个人实现这个目标，要么与你忠实的盟友一起行动。”

languages.text: « Forcez les faibles à s'agenouiller devant vous. Soumettez les puissants ou attendez le moment propice pour les frapper dans le dos. Agissez en solitaire ou avec vos alliés les plus fidèles. »
languages.original_text: "Make the weak kneel before you. Subdue the strong or wait for the moment to strike them in the back. Do it alone or with your faithful allies."

traits.locale_text: « Forcez les faibles à s'agenouiller devant vous. Soumettez les puissants ou attendez le moment propice pour les frapper dans le dos. Agissez en solitaire ou avec vos alliés les plus fidèles. »

languages.text: 「弱者は眼前に跪かせよ。強者は屈服させるか、あるいは背を見せた瞬間を待て。一人か、もしくは信頼できる仲間と共にやるのだ」
languages.original_text: "Make the weak kneel before you. Subdue the strong or wait for the moment to strike them in the back. Do it alone or with your faithful allies."

traits.locale_text: 「弱者は眼前に跪かせよ。強者は屈服させるか、あるいは背を見せた瞬間を待て。一人か、もしくは信頼できる仲間と共にやるのだ」

languages.text: «Haz que los débiles se arrodillen ante ti. Subyuga a los fuertes o espera el momento de apuñalarlos por la espalda. Hazlo por tu cuenta o con tus fieles aliados».
languages.original_text: "Make the weak kneel before you. Subdue the strong or wait for the moment to strike them in the back. Do it alone or with your faithful allies."

traits.locale_text: «Haz que los débiles se arrodillen ante ti. Subyuga a los fuertes o espera el momento de apuñalarlos por la espalda. Hazlo por tu cuenta o con tus fieles aliados».

languages.text: "Lasst die Schwachen vor Euch niederknien. Unterwerft die Starken oder wartet auf den richtigen Augenblick, um ihnen eine Klinge in den Rücken zu stoßen. Tut es allein oder mit Euren treuen Verbündeten."
languages.original_text: "Make the weak kneel before you. Subdue the strong or wait for the moment to strike them in the back. Do it alone or with your faithful allies."

traits.locale_text: "Lasst die Schwachen vor Euch niederknien. Unterwerft die Starken oder wartet auf den richtigen Augenblick, um ihnen eine Klinge in den Rücken zu stoßen. Tut es allein oder mit Euren treuen Verbündeten."

"Lasst die Schwachen vor Euch niederknien. Unterwerft die Starken oder wartet auf den richtigen Augenblick, um ihnen eine Klinge in den Rücken zu rammen. Tut es allein oder mit Euren treuen Verbündeten."

languages.text: "Zayıflara önünde diz çöktür. Güçlülere boyun eğdir veya sırtlarından bıçaklayacağın günün gelmesini bekle. İster kendi başına ister inançlı müttefiklerinle yap."
languages.original_text: "Make the weak kneel before you. Subdue the strong or wait for the moment to strike them in the back. Do it alone or with your faithful allies."
